data.title: Technician says now's the time to get back into tech
data.text: Robert Sluymer, Fundstrat Global Advisors, on whether there's a big tech bounce coming.

data.title: Amazon paid a Trump fundraiser to lobby against vendors who sell counterfeit goods
data.text: Brian Ballard, a leading fundraiser in Florida for Trump, has been lobbying members of Trump's administration and Congress on Amazon's behalf to fight back against third party vendors who are selling fake products to their customers.

data.title: Google, Facebook, Amazon, Apple face antitrust scrutiny
data.text: Government regulators have negotiated to split up oversight of Google, Facebook, Amazon and Apple, with the Department of Justice and Federal Trade Commission moving toward a new probe of Google, according to reporting by CNN's Brian Fung.

data.title: Top tech executives will be asked to testify in U.S. probe
data.text: Leaders of big tech companies will be asked to testify as part of an investigation into whether the companies misuse their massive market power, the head of the U.S. House Judiciary subcommittee leading the probe said on Tuesday.

data.title: FANG Stocks: Breakup Risks Are Relatively Low?
data.text: Amazon.com, Apple, Facebook and Google-parent Alphabet have taken a beating lately as investors worry about government and court actions defanging their businesses. FANG stocks have fallen.

data.title: 'A new era in commerce': Amazon Pay VP says voice payments potential is 'phenomenal'
data.text: The vice president of Amazon Pay believes consumers paying for goods with the sound of their voice will revolutionize the commerce industry.

data.title: The U.S. Government Has Big Tech in Its Crosshairs
data.text: Antitrust regulators are reportedly stepping up their scrutiny of the biggest tech companies.

data.title: We don't focus on how the stock market is moving, Amazon Pay VP says
data.text: Patrick Gauthier, vice president of Amazon Pay, discusses the technological disruption in payments.
